articles.title: UBS-Credit Suisse merger: Role rationalisation may lead to job cuts at India-based tech centres - Economic Times
articles.description: Both UBS and CS have about 7,000 people each across three Indian cities in their technology centres. After the merger, role rationalisation is likely to lead to many job losses in these areas as UBS will seek to retain only the best talent at Credit Suisse.
